name: Minecor
overview:
Minecor provides outsourced lead generation and contact list services for B2B complex sales. We build sales pipelines for high-tech, biotech, and financial services companies through outbound teleprospecting, lead management, lead nurturing, email marketing, market research and integrated marketing event management. Minecor has a working proprietary database of over 750,000 contacts and can provide over 19,000,000 contacts at wholesale rates through strategic data partners Jigsaw, Spoke, and others.

We work with the large companies in the technology industry such as Hitachi Data Systems, Toshiba, Dell and Oracle as well as smaller start-up companies. Two major strengths include: 1) ability to generate revenue producing pipelines, 2) 60 day product market trend snapshots straight from corporate IT buyers in North America.
